  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(long id, String password, String firstName, String lastName, String emailAddress, Date lastAccess, Date enrolDate, boolean enabled, char c, String programCode, String programDescription, int year) throws InvalidUserDataException
      Parameterized constructor that takes one argument for all attributes of the student and sets the values accordingly.
      Parameters:
      id - user's id
      password - user's password
      firstName - user's first name
      lastName - user's last name
      emailAddress - user's email address
      lastAccess - user's last access
      enrolDate - user's enrol date
      enabled - user's enabled
      c - user's type
      programCode - user's program code
      programDescription - user's program description
      year - user's current year
      Throws:
      InvalidUserDataException - when the user data is invalid

    • Student

      public Student(String programCode, String programDescription, int year) throws InvalidUserDataException
      an overloaded constructor that takes all student attributes accept the vector of marks and sends it to the above constructor with a null value for the marks vector.
      Parameters:
      programCode - student's program code
      programDescription - student's program description
      year - student's current year
      Throws:
      InvalidUserDataException - when the user data is invalid

    • Student

      public Student() throws InvalidUserDataException
      Default constructor that sets the default values for the student attributes and sends them to the above constructor.
      Throws:
      InvalidUserDataException - when the use data is invalid

      Returns:
      - Student object
      Throws:
